metadata.title: USN-4702-1 -- Pound vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Pound incorrectly handled certain HTTP requests A remote attacker could use it to retrieve some sensitive information. (CVE-2016-10711, CVE-2018-21245)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4702-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  pound - 2.6-6.1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
